com.yahoo.config.application.api

Class DeploymentSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.config.application.api.DeploymentSpec

  • public class DeploymentSpec
extends Object
    Specifies the environments and regions to which an application should be deployed. This may be used both for inspection as part of an application model and to answer queries about deployment from the command line. A main method is included for the latter usage.
    Author:
    bratseth
